appliance_auth.description: Required when enabled and type is appliance.

get.summary: Returns FCT system information queried by FGT SN

parameters.name: sn_list
parameters.description: List of FortiGate SN to filter by. If omitted and "uid_list" is also absent, it will return all unfiltered clients.

parameters.name: uid_list
parameters.description: List of FortiClient UIDs to filter by. If omitted and "sn_list" is also absent, it will return all unfiltered clients.

parameters.name: uid_offset
parameters.description: FortiClient UID to offset pagination filter. Must be used along with "updated_after" for the pagination filter to work. If omitted, it will treat it as no pagination filtering.

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Last updated timestamp value for pagination filter. Must be used along with "uid_offset" for the pagination filter to work. If omitted, it will treat it as no pagination filtering.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Additional filters to query sysinfo results by.

get.summary: Returns FCT host tag information queried by FGT SN

parameters.name: sn_list
parameters.description: List of FortiGate SN to filter by. If omitted and "uid_list" is also absent, it will return all unfiltered clients.

parameters.name: uid_list
parameters.description: List of FortiClient UIDs to filter by. If omitted and "sn_list" is also absent, it will return all unfiltered clients.

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Last updated timestamp value for pagination filter. If omitted, it will treat it as no pagination filtering.

parameters.name: send_mac
parameters.description: If set to True, response will return client MAC addresses along with IPs. Default is False.
